--- title: ml_utils keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Utilities to use sklearn for image processing" ---

class LambdaRow[source]

LambdaRow(row_func:Callable[ndarray, ndarray], to_features:bool=False, **kwargs) :: TransformerMixin

Apply a function on each row of the numpy array

import numpy as np

X = np.random.randint(0,255, size=(16,32,32))

LambdaRow(row_func=lambda x: x.mean()).fit_transform(X).shape

(16, 1)

Training utils¶

class TrainingOutput[source]

TrainingOutput(model:Pipeline, metrics:Dict[str, Any])

sk_train[source]

sk_train(xtrain:ndarray, xtest:ndarray, ytrain:ndarray, ytest:ndarray, model:Pipeline, metrics:Dict[str, Callable[ndarray, ndarray, Any]])

from sklearn.datasets import make_classification
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestClassifier
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

X, Y = make_classification(10000)

xtrain, xtest, ytrain, ytest = train_test_split(X, Y, train_size=0.5)

sk_train(xtrain, xtest, ytrain, ytest, RandomForestClassifier(), metrics=dict(acc=accuracy_score).items())

  "10 in version 0.20 to 100 in 0.22.", FutureWarning)

                       max_depth=None, max_features='auto', max_leaf_nodes=None,
                       min_impurity_decrease=0.0, min_impurity_split=None,

                       min_weight_fraction_leaf=0.0, n_estimators=10,
                       n_jobs=None, oob_score=False, random_state=None,

class PatchTransform[source]

PatchTransform(transformer:BaseEstimator, patch_size:int, max_patches:int, stride:int) :: TransformerMixin

from mlg_lib.imgfeat import flatten
from sklearn.pipeline import make_pipeline
from sklearn.decomposition import PCA
import numpy as np

patches = np.random.randint(0,255, size=(100,32,32))

PatchTransform(
    transformer=make_pipeline(LambdaRow(flatten), PCA(n_components=8)),
    patch_size=8,
    stride=8,
    max_patches=10
).fit_transform(patches).shape

(100, 128)
